trait.name: Sneak Attack (Spy)
entries: The junior intern deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the junior intern that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the junior intern doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Junior intern makes 2 dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) damage at range.

Junior Interns are individuals that have proven themselves usefull to the library, however will frequently require additional training. Rarely will they be allowed to take on significant missions without oversight or aid.
